page.title: 02Polperro harbour Lansallos
page.content: Originally a thriving working fishing harbour it is mainly used by small boats and yachts for,and by,holidaymakers.It is still used commercially by two 'purse seine' boats and some of the others do catch mackerel by longline. Crabs and lobsters are caught mainly for the local restaraunts.Vast amounts of pilchards were once caught and processed but are rarely seen now. The harbour entrnce is very narrow and dangerous in heavy seas and a huge elecrically operated steel gate protects the inner harbour, boats and walls.
